content.rendered:
EVENT COORDINATOR

Carly was born and raised in Chevy Chase, Maryland, but spent a lot of my time in Western New York, where her family now lives. Go Bills! 

She first became interested in events when she worked for the PGA Tour during the summers in college. Since then, Carly has worked all kinds of events, from wedding rehearsals to corporate luncheons, to larger events at her last job with Sweetens Cove Spirits. She loves the hustle, bustle, and adrenaline of working an event!

Outside of work, Carly loves trying new restaurants and bars in Nashville, playing golf, going to OrangeTheory, taking long walks, baking, and doing DIY projects for her apartment.
